QuestData.Title: Light at the End of the Tunnel
QuestData.Description: Okay, we have got to get out of here before she blows for good!$B$BLet's head out the other end of the tunnel on the north side of the mine. We should be able to use one of the mine carts for a quick ride down the side of the volcano.
QuestData.LogDescription: Interact with the Mine Cart outside the Gallywix Labor Mine on the Lost Isles.
